description: Students will undertake an individual ICT project in the early part of their third year.
This course explores various architectural and design factors that have to be taken into consideration when building complex web applications.
An introductory course that provides a practical overview of machine learning.
Software design and architecture encompasses the functional and the non-functional aspects of Software Engineering.
This course provides an overview of methods of testing, verification and validation, quality assurance processes and techniques, methods and types of testing and ISO 9000/SEI CMM process evaluation.
Students will learn the core concepts of cloud computing & Vitualization.
This is a course on program applications for the ICT Systems Developement.
